title: Lag only on League of Legends?
body:
Seems like I always lag on this game... and only this game....

Test on Ookla: 5 ping, 5mbps download, 0.5 upload.

Ping on other games: 40-60

Ping on league: 60-4000 (seriously)

Why? :(

replies.body:
Inconsistent latency (ping) to the server is generally caused by either local network configurations or poor ISP routing to that specific server. To weed out the easy fixes, I recommend working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if you continue to see high latency after working through that guide.
Thanks! I always thought I had google DNS. I did, but I never flushed the old settings. No lag so far now! :){{summoner:31}}
